SHIPPING AND DELIVERY POLICY

Tria Packaging Solutions - Shipping Policy

Effective Date: October 1, 2025

1. DELIVERY AREAS
We deliver to all areas in Singapore:
- Standard delivery: All Singapore postal codes
- Express delivery: Central Business District and selected areas
- International shipping: Available upon request (contact for quote)

2. DELIVERY TIMEFRAMES

STANDARD DELIVERY:
- Stock items: 2-3 business days
- Custom orders: 5-7 business days
- Bulk orders (>$5,000): 7-10 business days

EXPRESS DELIVERY:
- Available for stock items only
- Same-day delivery: Orders placed before 12:00 PM
- Next-day delivery: Orders placed before 5:00 PM
- Express charges apply: $50-$150 depending on order size

3. SHIPPING COSTS
- Free shipping: Orders above $500 SGD
- Standard shipping: $25 SGD flat rate
- Express shipping: $50-$150 SGD based on urgency
- Bulk orders: Custom shipping quote

4. DELIVERY PROCESS
Our delivery process:
a) Order confirmation email sent within 1 hour
b) Production/picking begins within 24 hours
c) Shipping notification with tracking number
d) Delivery during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM)
e) Signature required for orders above $1,000

5. TRACKING
- All orders include tracking number
- Track via: tracking.triapackaging.com
- SMS updates: Enabled by default
- Email updates: Available upon request

6. DELIVERY ISSUES

FAILED DELIVERY:
- If recipient unavailable: Re-delivery scheduled
- Maximum 2 re-delivery attempts
- After 2 failed attempts: Held at warehouse for 5 days
- Collection available at: 123 Packaging Ave, Singapore 123456

DAMAGED DELIVERY:
- Inspect package upon delivery
- Report damage immediately to driver
- Photo documentation required
- Replacement processed within 24 hours

WRONG DELIVERY:
- Contact us immediately: +65 6234 5678
- Collection arranged within 24 hours
- Correct items shipped same day

7. SPECIAL HANDLING
For fragile or temperature-sensitive items:
- Special handling available upon request
- Climate-controlled delivery for specific products
- White-glove delivery service: +$100 SGD

Contact Information:
Email: shipping@triapackaging.com
Phone: +65 6234 5678
WhatsApp: +65 9123 4567
Business Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM SGT
